Bash("/c/Python313/python.exe" -c "
import urllib.request, zipfile, os
url = ''https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/ffmpeg-release-essentials.zip''
dest = ''C:/ffmpeg-download.zip''
print\(''Downloading ffmpeg...''\)
urllib.request.urlretrieve\(url, dest\)
print\(''Extracting...''\)
with zipfile.ZipFile\(dest, ''r''\) as z:
    z.extractall\(''C:/ffmpeg-temp''\)
print\(''Done''\)
# Find the bin folder
for root, dirs, files in os.walk\(''C:/ffmpeg-temp''\):
    if ''ffmpeg.exe'' in files:
        print\(f''Found at: {root}''\)
        break
")

Bash("/c/Python313/python.exe" -c "
import urllib.request, zipfile, os
url = ''https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/ffmpeg-release-essentials.zip''
dest = os.path.join\(os.environ[''TEMP''], ''ffmpeg-download.zip''\)
extract_dir = os.path.join\(os.environ[''TEMP''], ''ffmpeg-temp''\)
print\(''Downloading ffmpeg...''\)
urllib.request.urlretrieve\(url, dest\)
print\(''Extracting...''\)
with zipfile.ZipFile\(dest, ''r''\) as z:
    z.extractall\(extract_dir\)
print\(''Done''\)
for root, dirs, files in os.walk\(extract_dir\):
    if ''ffmpeg.exe'' in files:
        print\(f''BIN_DIR={root}''\)
        break
")
